data.title: Is Evolution Responsive?
data.faq_text: Evolution is built mobile first, this means that we write all of our code for mobile then through media queries we then make the minor adjustments to make our patterns work on the desktop.

data.title: What browsers to we support?
data.faq_text: Evolution has been designed and tested for many browsers and devices. If you would like to see the lastest information of what is support please visit out browser support page here
